title: Pentium 4
summary: Pentium 4[1][2] is a series of single-core CPUs for desktops, laptops and entry-level servers manufactured by Intel. The processors were shipped from November 20, 2000 until August 8, 2008.[3][4] The production of Netburst processors was active from 2000 until May 21, 2010.[5][4]
